lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson had 11 one-putts and converted all six sand saves in a two-under-par 68 in the second round of the Crowne Plaza Invitational in Fort Worth, taking the lead at seven-under 133. Mickelson led Matt Kuchar (64), Brian Gay (65) and Johnson Wagner (71) by one stroke.
